TopicTitle: VAB Placement And Part Symmetry Issues

Articles.Content: when trying to use part symmetry at first placing them would apply symmetry however when using the translate tool the other side dissapeared, then when trying to put it back on mirror symmetry would stop working entirely, i then tried radial symmetry and when using the translate tool the part glitched out and did not translate properly, then i tried using the undo key and expirience the craft deletion issue which i belive is known already, then after reloading the craft and trying to put the tank back on it would not attach itself to any of the nodes, then when dropping it and picking it back up again it duplicated over and over and over again, examples of the issues are shown in the following videos
